description: Marcus is finally showing up on NextDoorMale after making his way through TommyDxxx and NextDoorBuddies.This body builder is one of the nicest guys you'll ever meet, a truly genuine person.When he's not in the gym, Marcus is hanging out with the love of his life. They've been together for a couple of years and he hopes to get married one day. For now though, Marcus is trying out a bit of adult entertainment to fuel his sexual needs...and to pay off his house!For this scene, Marcus strokes himself in bed, and finishes himself on the bedroom stairs. We hope you enjoy!
title: Marcus
